divs: sighting detailsat about 8:20 pm on saturday 10\27\07,i was going on my way to visit my sister,i am driving north on highway 680,rigth before mission ave,i looked west to see the view of the bay,i am always looking up to the sky, and this is not the first time i seen things like this,then i see a dark triangle object with flashing ligths,there was about five or six ligths,that were going round and round,i was on the fast lane and i pulled over as fast as i could,i got my cell phone and took a couple of pix,but when i reviewed the pix the object was to far,this object was hovering next to the freeway going south towards downtown san jose,it did not change altitude or speed,it was about two blocks away from the freeway,and at about 600 or 700 feet from the top of the houses.i wanted to post this because, today in this website i saw a report and pictures of something similar to what i saw, and rigth the next morning.
Summary: going north I-680 8:20 PM i saw flashing ligths on each side of the object.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Fremont
There were no other sightings in Fremont on or around October 27th 2007
